member.name: T:SandcastleBuilder.PlugIns.AjaxDocPlugIn
member.summary: This plug-in class is designed to generate XML comments and reflection file information for Atlas client script libraries using AjaxDoc.

remarks.note: DEPRECATED: AjaxDoc is considered obsolete and has been replaced by JsDoc. In addition, this plug-in will only work on Windows using the full .NET Framework.
If you want the visibility settings and API filter applied, add the Manual Visibility/API filter plug-in to the project as well.

member.name: P:SandcastleBuilder.PlugIns.AjaxDocPlugIn.ExecutionPoints
member.summary: This read-only property returns a collection of execution points that define when the plug-in should be invoked during the build process.

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.PlugIns.AjaxDocPlugIn.Initialize(SandcastleBuilder.Utils.BuildEngine.BuildProcess,System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: This method is used to initialize the plug-in at the start of the build process
member.param: A reference to the current build process
The configuration data that the plug-in should use to initialize itself
member.exception: This is thrown if the plug-in configuration is not valid

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.PlugIns.AjaxDocPlugIn.Execute(SandcastleBuilder.Utils.BuildComponent.ExecutionContext)
member.summary: This method is used to execute the plug-in during the build process

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.PlugIns.AjaxDocPlugIn.Dispose
member.summary: This implements the Dispose() interface to properly dispose of the plug-in object

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.PlugIns.AjaxDocPlugIn.RunBrowser
member.summary: This is the entry point for the thread that runs the browser to invoke AjaxDoc

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.PlugIns.AjaxDocPlugIn.wb_DocumentCompleted(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserDocumentCompletedEventArgs)
member.summary: Hook up the error handler on completion to handle script errors

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.PlugIns.AjaxDocPlugIn.Window_Error(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementErrorEventArgs)
member.summary: If a script error occurs, stop processing

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.PlugIns.AjaxDocPlugIn.wb_Navigated(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserNavigatedEventArgs)
member.summary: This notes when the page completes navigating
member.remarks: If ran successfully, the page navigates twice. The first time is the initial page load. It immediately submits itself to post the results. On the second navigation, we can assume it was successful and the page contains the "success" result message.
